description: Cinema 4D is a Windows and macOS app that provides various features for creating realistic images and graphics for games, movies, architectural design, and motion graphics. The L4D format allows you to customize the app layout to preserve and share with other Cinema 4D users. To save a layout as an L4D file, select Window → Customization → Save Layout as .

Additionally, users can create multiple L4D files that store layouts for different editing tasks. For example, while one perspective may be for editing 3D object geometry, another may have a better layout for animation.
